WorkSheet.Sql: SELECT a.art_tn, tg_objektart.name as art_tn_text, alkisgeometrie_f.tn_key_desc, round(sum(a.afl::numeric),2) as flaeche FROM tg_nutzung a LEFT JOIN tg_objektarten tg_objektart ON tg_objektart.objektart = a.art_tn INNER JOIN alkisgeometrie_f ON alkisgeometrie_f.id_hash = a.id_tn_hash AND alkisgeometrie_f.endet is null WHERE a.endet is null GROUP BY a.art_tn, tg_objektart.name, alkisgeometrie_f.tn_key_desc ORDER BY tg_objektart.name, alkisgeometrie_f.tn_key_desc
